name: Doggy Kart v. 0
description:
This is a prototype I intend to build out and/or rework in the future. I'm open to feedback! Let me know your best time in the comments.

You are Campy the Dog, an entrant in the yearly Doggy Kart Cup.

Race 3 laps through beautiful Ice Beach and compete for the best time!

Steer: Arrow keys

Jump: Z

Accelerate: X

Art and programming by me!
